src:
Segera Dirilis, Berapa Harga Zenfone 6 di Indonesia?
07 Nov 2019, 17:50 by Anggoro Suryo Jati - detikInet


Foto: Adi Fida Rahman/detikINET

Jakarta - Setelah lama tertunda, Asus bakal segera merilis Zenfone 6 ke Indonesia, dan harga ponsel flagship mereka itu dipastikan tak sampai Rp 8 juta."Harga pasti di bawah Rp 8 juta," ujar ujar Head of Public Relation & e-Marketing Asus Indonesia, Muhammad Firman kepada detikINET di Jakarta, Kamis (7/11/2019).Itu adalah harga untuk Zenfone 6 varian RAM 6 GB dan storage 128GB, yaitu satu-satunya varian Zenfone 6 yang diboyong Asus ke Indonesia. Sementara versi RAM 8GB dan storage 256GB dipastikan tak akan hadir secara resmi di sini.Sebagai perbandingan, harga Zenfone 6 saat dirilis secara global adalah 499 euro (Rp 7,7 juta) untuk versi 6/128, dan 599 euro (Rp 9,2 juta) untuk varian 8/256.Ponsel ini bakal meluncur pada 15 November mendatang dan untuk awalnya akan dijual secara online di Erafone.com dan Tokopedia.Zenfone 6 adalah ponsel dengan desain kamera yang unik, yaitu kamera belakangnya bisa diputar ke depan untuk menjadi kamera selfie. Kamera belakangnya sendiri ada dua, yaitu kamera utama 48 megapixel dan kamera ultrawide 13 megapixel.Selain bisa berputar 180 derajat, kameranya ini juga bisa diputar dengan sudut lainnya untuk memudahkan proses pemotretan. Asus mengklaim kamera ini sudah diuji buka tutup sebanyak 100 ribu kali, dan ada juga sensor gravitasi yang akan mendeteksi jika jatuh, sehingga kamera akan menutup untuk keamanan.Soal spek, Zenfone 6 punya layar IPS 6,4 inch Full HD+ Gorilla Glass 6, prosesornya adalah Snapdragon 855, GPU Adreno 640, baterai 5000 mAh dengan dukungan Quick Charge 4.0 18W, dan sistem operasi ZenUI berbasis Android 9. Simak Video "Zenfone 6 'Made in Indonesia' Mendarat hingga ke Eropa, Apa Kata Asus?"[Gambas:Video 20detik](asj/fyk)
text:
Released Soon, How Much is the Zenfone 6 in Indonesia?
Nov 7 2019, 17:50 by Anggoro Suryo Jati - detikInet


Photo: Adi Fida Rahman / detikINET

Jakarta - After a long delay, Asus will soon release the Zenfone 6 to Indonesia, and the price of their flagship phone will certainly not reach Rp. 8 million. "The price must be under Rp. 8 million," said Asus Indonesia's Head of Public Relations & e-Marketing. , Muhammad Firman told detikINET in Jakarta, Thursday (11/07/2019). That was the price for the Zenfone 6 variant of 6GB RAM and 128GB of storage, which is the only Zenfone 6 variant brought by Asus to Indonesia. While the 8GB RAM version and 256GB storage certainly will not be present officially here. For comparison, the price of Zenfone 6 when released globally is 499 euros (Rp7.7 million) for the 6/128 version, and 599 euros (Rp.2.2) million) for the 8/256 variant. This cellphone will launch on November 15 and will initially be sold online at Erafone.com and Tokopedia. Zenfone 6 is a cellphone with a unique camera design, the rear camera can be rotated forward to become a camera selfie. The rear camera itself has two, namely a 48 megapixel main camera and a 13 megapixel ultrawide camera. In addition to being able to rotate 180 degrees, this camera can also be rotated at other angles to facilitate the shooting process. Asus claims this camera has been tested open and closed 100 thousand times, and there is also a gravity sensor that will detect if it falls, so the camera will close for security. Regarding the specs, Zenfone 6 has a 6.4 inch IPS screen Full HD + Gorilla Glass 6, the processor is Snapdragon 855, GPU Adreno 640, 5000 mAh battery with Quick Charge 4.0 18W support, and ZenUI operating system based on Android 9. See Video "Zenfone 6 'Made in Indonesia' Landing to Europe, What is Asus Say?" [Gambas: Video 20 seconds] (asj / fyk)
